title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% of patients completed assessments, reducing discontinuation risk by 30%.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate mobile app for seamless data entry and tracking.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA mandating PRO integration in trials within 12 months.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may skew results toward healthier patients.
